Package it.uninsubria.shared.rmi

Interface BookService

All Superinterfaces:
Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
BookServiceImpl
public interface BookService extends Remote
Remote interface for book-related operations in the Book Recommender system. Provides methods for book search, retrieval, caching, and suggestion management via RMI (Remote Method Invocation).

This interface supports:

  • Global and filtered book searches
  • Paginated results for performance
  • Per-user caching for concurrent clients
  • Book suggestion and recommendation features
  • Review aggregation and retrieval
Since:
1.0
Version:
1.0
Author:
Book Recommender Team

  • Method Details

    • searchGlobally

      List<Book> searchGlobally() throws RemoteException
      Retrieves all books from the system for global search.
      Returns:
      a list of all books in the system
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a communication error occurs

    • searchByTitle

      Parameters:
      query - the search query for book titles
      Returns:
      a list of books matching the title query
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a communication error occurs
